title: Happy Hospital Games for Kids
description:
The hospital needs you! Grab your white coat and stethoscope, then jump in! There are patients with all kinds of aches and pains. Visit each treatment room and meet the unwell characters who need your help. Next, play fun games to blast away bugs, get rid of germs, tend to toothaches, and help all the patients feel good as new!

Designed for preschoolers and toddlers to have fun while building an awareness of health and hygiene. Your little one will love helping all the cute characters get better and leave the hospital feeling happy and healthy. Doctor roleplaying games provide safe, fun, and educational screen time that you can feel good about.

WHAT’S INSIDE THE APP
- 3 treatment rooms jam-packed with fun items and equipment to interact with. Tap and explore to see what they do!
- 5 super fun hospital games:
BACTERIA BATTLE — Stop the little bacteria bugs making their way through the intestines in this classic tower defense game. Tap to shoot and clear the way!
STOMACH PROTECTOR — The stomach is under constant attack from nasty germs that are up to no good! Tap to guide the medicine to the right place and wipe them out!
HEALTHY LUNGS — Use the medicine canon to blast away the nasty bugs and germs that are trying to cause problems with your patients’ lungs!
TEETH CLEANER — These patients must have forgotten to brush their teeth, there are little bugs and germs everywhere. Tap them quickly before they hide, and remind your patient to eat less candy!
SKIN RASH ZAP — Viruses are causing a nasty rash on some of the hospital’s patients. Use arrows and time your shot to blast away the virus and heal your patient.

KEY FEATURES:
- Ad-free with no disruptions, enjoy uninterrupted play
- Promotes health and hygiene awareness
- 20 levels of difficulty — from super simple to challenging
- Kid-friendly, colorful, and enchanting design
- No parental support needed, simple and intuitive gameplay
- Play offline, no wifi needed — perfect for traveling

ABOUT US
We make apps and games that kids and parents love! Our range of products lets kids of all ages learn, grow, and play. Check out our Developers Page to see more.

Contact us: hello@bekids.com
